description: Hello...: ) Hi, well I'm a small town/country guy. I am 5' 9", hair is salt & pepper, goatee, med brn skin, drk brn eyes, 185lbs, xl shirt, 35 waist. I generally wear t-shirt long sleeve work shirt, jeans & wrk boots. I do own a couple of suits (country style) been told I clean up nice. Just looking to retire. I am not a fancy guy its the easy simple things in life that make me smile now. All that would I would need to make it special is a good woman.
intent: Fun, Friendship, Romance, Serious Relationship, Marriage
